name: HIKVISION T200N 256GB SSD USB 3.1 Type-C and High-Speed Read-Write (450 MB-s)
data:
High-Speed Transmission: The maximum read speed is up to 450MB/s and which is 4 times faster than a mechanical hard disk.Capacity Expansion for Mobile Phones: Can connect to Android phones and Android tablets and and other devices via OTG cables for expanded storage.Shock Resistant and Heat Dissipation: The metal case helps dissipate heat effectively. The consumer SSD uses the E2000 M.2 interface.3D NAND Flash: Stereoscopic storage technology allows each storage unit to be more compact and greatly improving the storage capacity of flash memory.
	 
	Overview:
Introduction
The T200N Portable SSD is designed to expand storage capacity for Android phones and Android tablets and PCs and and laptops via the USB 3.1 Type-C interface and addressing the need for long-term and large-capacity storage. The T200N series SSD is popular among individuals and designers and and video editors who require reliable and fast storage.

name: SAMSUNG 990 PRO with Heatsink SSD 2TB and PCIe Gen4 M.2 2280 Internal Solid State Hard Drive and Seq. Read Speeds Up To 7 and450MB/s for High End Computing

SAMSUNG 990 PRO w/Heatsink SSD 4TB and PCIe Gen4 M.2 2280 Internal Solid State Hard Drive and Seq. Read Speeds Up to 7 and450MB/s for High End Computing and Workstations and Compatible w/Playstation 5 and MZ-V9P4T0CW
data: The Samsung 990 PRO Gen 4 SSD with a built-in heatsink is indeed a powerhouse for high-performance computing. Its blazing speeds of up to 7450 MB/s (read) and 6900 MB/s (write) make it a top choice for demanding tasks like gaming and video editing and and data analysis. The PCIe Gen 4.0 technology ensures that it takes full advantage of modern computing hardware and pushing near maximum throughput for seamless operation.The integrated heatsink is crucial in managing temperatures and preventing thermal throttling during extended sessions and making it ideal for continuous heavy use and such as during long gaming sessions or professional editing. Its 55% improved random performance over the 980 PRO highlights its ability to handle complex data handling and which is great for those needing fast loading times or quick access to large files.In terms of storage and with capacities ranging from 1TB to 4TB and it covers a wide spectrum of needs and from casual gamers to professional users working with large datasets. Additionally and its PS5 compatibility (PCI-SIG D8 standard) ensures it will perform well not only in desktops and laptops but also in PlayStation 5 and providing a seamless experience for gamers.This SSD is designed for users looking for cutting-edge performance and reliability in their storage solutions.

name: KLEVV DDR5 16GB 5600MHz CL46 Laptop Ram
data:
About this item
DDR5 Overwhelming Performance Enhanced Bandwidth Efficiency: KLEVV DDR5 SO-DIMM memory module delivers starting speed at 4800MT/s which leads to faster increase of fundamental frequency. It shows 1.87 times better bandwidth efficiency compared to DDR4 memory.
Lower Voltage and Highly Improved Performance Built-in PMIC: While achieving 20% lower power consumption compared to DDR4 memory and DDR5 memory can reduce dynamic voltage and increase power efficiency and enabling for better power distribution.
Improved Work Efficiency Fast Data Transfer: With higher memory bandwidth and even faster speed and DDR5 memory can shorten the response time of multi core processor and optimize the system performance as a whole. Through this and more efficient multitasking can be delivered.
Innovative Power Management Technology Built-in PMIC: The DDR5 has power management transferred from the motherboard to the memory and effective system power loads are managed through PMIC technology.
Decreased Operating Voltage: The DDR5 can exhibit high performance even with a lower operating voltage of 1.1V.
Next Generation Performance DDR5: The data bus channel of existing DDR4 memory module is designed to exchange data in a 64-bit single channel and but DDR5 module allows 32-bit data to be exchanged with dual channels. You can also use only one of the two memory channels to increase memory access efficiency as well as the transfer speed.
Fixing Issue from the Chip Itself Improving Stability through On-Die ECC: On-Die ECC (On-Die Error Correction Code) inside the chip allows single-bit correction. It improves application security by enhancing overall data reliability.

name: General RING LIGHT LF-R420C 18 INCH
data:
Ring LED Light
LED ring light can be mounted on the holder and take it anywhere and it can also be removed from the stand at any time and the tripod ball head can 360 degree rotating can free to adjust to any angle (The holder is not included).
The ring light is made of energy-saving LED beads and it heat dissipation is excellent and constant current drive and high color rendering and soften the light source and enhance skin tone in portraits photography.
3 colors up mode adjustable brightness for your choose andyou can adjust the color and brightness very easily and excellent brightness can be achieved without installing extra colorful filters. Three colors of soft natural light illuminate your beauty in different occasions.
The USB ports can be used with multiple devices and such as connect computer host and laptop and mobile power and USB charger. You will be able to enjoy LED ring light at any time.
Lightweight and portable design: Convenient to use and carry when you traveling or working outdoor etc.
The phone clamp suitable for the cellphone width of 6-9.5cm.
Extensive application: It is widely applied to outdoor photo light and filling light indoors and portrait and fashion and advertisement photography and shooting video etc.
When LED ring light is on and press and hold the ON/OFF button until to the indicator flashes. At this time and enter the delay off mode and delay one minute.

name: SAMSUNG 870 QVO 8TB SATA III 2.5
data:
The 870 QVO is Samsung’s latest 2nd gen. QLC SSD and the largest of its kind that provides up to 8TB of storage*. Offering an incredible upgrade for everyday PC users who want to ramp-up their desktop PC or laptop to the largest available storage in the market* without compromising on performance.
With an expanded SATA interface limit of 560/530 MB/s sequential speeds and the 870 QVO improves random access speed and sustained performance. Intelligent TurboWrite accelerates write speeds and maintains long-term high performance with a larger variable buffer.

name: SAMSUNG 870 4TB QVO SATA III 2.5
data:
With an expanded SATA interface limit of 560/530 MB/s sequential speeds and the 870 QVO improves random access speed and sustained performance. Intelligent TurboWrite accelerates write speeds and maintains long-term high performance with a larger variable buffer.
The groundbreaking capacity of the 870 QVO doubles
its reliability from 1 and440 TBW to up to 2 and880 TBW and using a refined ECC (error-correcting code) algorithm for stable performance. Plus andfor ultimate peace of mind.
Upgrading to 870 QVO is now easier than ever for anyone with a desktop PC or laptop that supports a standard 2.5-inch SATA form factor. Simply plug in the 870 QVO into a SATA slot and let the updated migration software take care of the rest.
Keep your SSD in check with Samsung Magician 6.1 software. Manage your drive and enhance its performance with a wide range of useful tools to keep up with the latest updates and monitor the drive's health and status.

name: REDRAGON K552P KUMARA PRO RGB Wireless Gaming Mechanical Keyboard – Blue Switches
data:
Wireless Made Easy – Enjoy the freedom of wireless with a 2.4G/ Bluetooth 5.0 connection and 3000mAh long-lasting battery capacity. Reliable and fast connects hassle-free with devices such as laptops and tablets and and even phones that support Bluetooth.
Dual Mode Switch – Easily switch between wireless and wired modes with the mode switch on the side. Included USB-C cable gives you the option to go wired for competitive games.Hot-Swappable Blue Switches – Distinctive tactile blue switch offers fantastic audile typing feedback. Hot-swappable with other Redragon switches. Made to last with switches rated for 50 million keypresses.
LED RGB Backlit Mechanical Gaming Keyboard 18 different RGB lighting modes and 9 different colors and 5 backlight brightness levels and breathing speed. Precision engineered keycaps offering crystal clear uniform backlighting
Anti Ghosting and ALL 87 keys are conflict free n-Key Rollover for ultimate Gaming performance. 12 Multimedia keys and Non-Slip Ergonomic and splash-proof Design with adjustable typing angle and High-Speed USB cable with gold-plated corrosion free USB connector
Compact TKL Tenkeyless Ergonomic Designed Computer Keyboard Durable Metal-ABS Construction with Plate-mounted mechanical keys and switches that stand up during marathon FPS gaming sessions

Key Advantages
Broadest 2.5-inch hard drive portfolio with up to 5 TB capacity and both 7 mm 
and 15 mm form factors suitable for a variety of compute applications.
Thinnest and lightest 2.5-inch hard drive with up to 2 TB storage in a 7 mm 
z-height and providing seamless upgrades of thin and light laptops and smaller form
factor systems.
Fast data rates of up to 140 MB/s enables superior PC end-user experience 
and snappier file transfers.
2.5-inch and 15 mm z-height hard drives provide 3 TB to 5 TB in capacity and offering 
the highest-capacity 2.5-inch hard drives available for external or all-in-one storage.
15 mm z-height enables slimmer all-in-one desktop PC drives while helping 
reduce system heat generation and vibration. 
Low startup current configurations for 3 TB to 5 TB drives enable use in legacy 
low-current systems like USB-2 external boxes and while simultaneously lowering 
power consumption

ASUS ZenDrive U8M ultraslim external DVD drive & writer and USB C® interface and compatible with Windows and Mac OS and M-DISC support and comprehensive backup solutions included
- Iconic design: Robust construction with Zen-inspired concentric-circle finish
- USB-C interface: Perfect companion for latest-gen ASUS ZenBook or other ultraslim laptop
- M-DISC support: Save your precious photos and videos and data for up to 1 and000 years
- Drag and burn: Create a disc in just three steps and via intuitive interface (Windows OS)
- Disc encryption: Hassle-free data protection through password control and hidden-folder functions (Windows OS)
- Backup software included: Nero BackItUp enables easy archival of photos and videos or data to your HDD or SSD (Windows OS)
- Windows or Mac OS: Cross-platform support for broad compatibility

name: Patriot P300 M.2 PCIe Gen 3 x4 512GB Low-Power Consumption SSD
data: The P300 is Patriot’s next generation of mid-tier PCIe gen 3x4 NVMe SSD to hit the market and offering 25% higher transfer speeds and IOPs than standard PCIe 3x2 solutions. The compact m.2 form factor is designed for easy installation and will fit into any PC or laptop and while its low power consumption helps extend laptop battery life.  The P300 is guaranteed to improve start-up and loading and and transfer times over traditional hard disk drives.

name: SAMSUNG -32 Smart Monitor M7 4K VA 60Hz 8ms(GTG) HDR10 Speaker+Remote LS32BM700UMXUE
data:
The World's 1st Do-It-All Screen
The monitor for every side of life. Get work done without a PC and with the installed Microsoft Office 365 and or by remote access to your office computer. Then switch to pure entertainment with the on-board one-stop entertainment system.
Smart TV Apps
Binge watching got even easier. Access a bunch of entertainment apps and such as Netflix and YouTube and and HBO and without switching on your PC or laptop. The remote control and built-in speakers simplify your chill time.
Work and learn from a distance
Remote Access
Work seamlessly from anywhere. Boost your productivity with Remote Access features. Using the Office 365 suite and view and edit documents and and conveniently save them all on the cloud. Even while at home and Remote Access lets you work remotely on your school or office desktop.
Optimal brightness for any ambience
Adaptive Picture
Sensational picture and day or night. Surrounding light is detected by a sensor to adjust brightness automatically with Adaptive Picture. Even in broad daylight and watch dark and gritty dramas without squinting and straining your eyes to see the picture.
Ultrawide Game View
Keep your eye on the win. Adjust your screen to 21:9 to discover hidden areas in game scenes with Ultrawide Game View. Now when you play soccer games and see more of the pitch right up to the goalposts. And in driving games and get a natural and encompassing view of the road ahead.
More pixels show you more
UHD resolution
Astonishing picture quality for work and play. With 4x the pixels of Full HD and the Smart Monitor delivers more screen space and amazingly life-like UHD images. By day and see more documents at once. And and in the evening and watch movies in cinematic 4K quality.Connect with convenience
USB type-C
The USB type-C port enables you to power up and transmit data and and even send display signals between devices with just one connection. Its single connection architecture brings an enjoyable work environment that's both clutter-free and stress-free.

name: Razer Pro Click High-precision ergonomic wireless mouse for productivity
data:
High-precision ergonomic wireless mouse for productivity
Ergonomic design co-designed with Humanscale
Razer™ 5G Advanced Optical Sensor
Extended battery life of up to 400 hoursBEST IN CLASS ERGONOMICS CO-DESIGNED WITH HUMANSCALE
Razer teamed up with Humanscale and the world’s premier experts of office ergonomics to bring you a mouse that is based entirely on the latest human factors research.
 
 
POWERED FOR CUTTING-EDGE PRECISION AND ALL-DAY COMFORT AT WORK
Engineered by top ergonomics scientists and designers and its added palm support prevents your wrist from anchoring onto work surfaces and alleviating strain and promoting better arm posture.
 
 
ABOUT HUMANSCALE
Humanscale is the leading designer and manufacturer of ergonomic products that improve the health and comfort of work life.
 
 
 
RAZER 5G ADVANCED OPTICAL SENSOR
Its 16 and000 DPI sensor ensures even the finest movement of your mouse is tracked and giving you an acute level of precision that maximizes your productivity and efficiency at work.
 
 
EXTENDED BATTERY LIFE OF UP TO 400 HOURS
Work without worry. The battery lasts up to 400 hours when connected via Bluetooth and and up to 200 hours when connected via 2.4GHz wireless and allowing you to power through long hours of work.
 
 
 
OTHER FEATURESDurable For up to 50 Million Clicks
Designed as the ultimate go-to mouse for productivity and the switches in the Razer™ Pro Click are durable for up to 50 million clicks and combining performance with longevity.Multi-host Connectivity for up to 4 Devices
Pair up to 4 devices and conveniently switch between your desktop and laptop and Android tablet or TV screen with just one click and without the constant need to pair and unpair.8 Programmable Buttons
Power users and now you can work faster and smarter by assigning macros and secondary functions to any of the 8 independently programmable buttons.

name: Razer Goliathus Mobile Slim and flexible for maximum mobility
data:
Slim and flexible for maximum mobility
Slim and Flexible for Maximum Mobility
Engineered for Both Speed and Control Playstyles
Optimized Surface for Highly Responsive TrackingFOR THE HARDCORE ON THE GOSLIM AND FLEXIBLE FOR MAXIMUM MOBILITY
At a mere 1.5 mm thin and the Razer Goliathus Mobile is easy to carry with you everywhere. You can either place this slim and durable mouse mat between your laptop screen and keyboard and or roll it up and place it in your bag without worrying about it ever warping.ENGINEERED FOR BOTH SPEED AND CONTROL PLAYSTYLES
Designing a mouse mat for gamers on the go means striking a critical balance of supporting different playstyles on a single mat. The result of extensive research and field-testing is the Razer Goliathus Mobile — fully capable of giving you a smooth glide for swiftness and superb stopping power for control.OPTIMIZED SURFACE FOR HIGHLY RESPONSIVE TRACKING
Meticulous attention to detail went into the creation of the Razer Goliathus Mobile. The super fine micro texture weave is engineered specifically to work with both optical and laser mouse sensors and providing you with an optimal surface for tournament-grade tracking. Now even the most precise mouse movements you make will be translated accurately on screen

data:
Wired Gaming Mouse with Side Buttons
The Redragon M601 RGB “Centrophorus” is a durable gaming Mouse which delivers up to 7200 DPI (user adjustable 800/1200/1600/2400/7200 DPI) and 4000 FPS. The High-Precision Sensor delivers Pinpoint Accuracy while Micro Switches ensure longevity and greater durability and extreme responsiveness during PC Gaming or Computer editing work.RGB Backlit Programmable PC Gaming Mouse
With 11 Lighting Effects (Backlight can be disabled) and 6 user programmable buttons and 2 Side Buttons and 3 Memory Profiles with Macro Recording and The Redragon M601 RGB Gaming Mouse offers you many personalization options for your Gaming Computer or Gaming Laptop.Ergonomic Gamer Mouse
Delivering an extremely comfortable and precise experience for Computer Games. The ergonomic shape of the Redragon M601 RGB Gaming Mouse offers comfort and fits naturally in your hand while the buttons are tuned to reduce click fatigue.High-End PC MMO Gaming Mouse Features
The Redragon M601 RGB Mouse features; Weight Tuning Set and Anti-Skid Scroll Wheel and Durable smooth TEFLON feet pads for ultimate gaming control. 6 programmable buttons. Total 7 buttons. Comes with 6 foot and 3mm strong high-speed braided fiber cable and a gold-plated corrosion free USB connector for a reliable connection.

name: ONIKUMA K10-RGB-GAMING HEADSET
data:
Perfect sound:
The high precision 50mm drivers of the K10 bring you vivid and clear sound and bringing to life shots and explosions as they whizz by you in game.
Designed for comfort:
Ergonomically designed and with super soft over the ear pads and the K10 are some of the comfiest headphones we've ever made and ensuring your absolute comfort after long gaming sessions.
Durable and noise reduction microphone:
The awesome in built mic is super flexible and so you never have to worry about pop while chatting to your friends. And with the multi-function in line remote you can keep your eyes on the prize and access your sound or mic settings for extra functionality.
Superior compatibility:
Compatibility ahoy! Fitting pretty much every device with a 3.5mm headphone/microphone port and it'll work with your awesome gaming rig and laptops and ps4 and the new X-Box one and your mobile phone and Mac OS and iOS and and moreeeee! 
Feel free to contact us if you ever have any problems via our handy contact page.
